text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples' Region | native_name = ደቡብ ብሔሮች ብሔረሰቦችና ሕዝቦች ክልል | native_name_lang = am | settlement_type = Regional State | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Flag of the Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples%27_Region.svg | image_seal = Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples' Region emblem.png | image_map = Southern Nations, Nationalities, and People's Region in Ethiopia.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Ethiopia showing Southern Nations, Nationalities, and People's Region | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Awasa | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 105,887.18 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 19,170,007 | population_as_of = 2017 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = ET-SN | website = }} Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples' Region is a region in Ethiopia. It is also known as SNNPR. The capital city is Awasa. ==Administrative zones== The following list of administrative zones and special woredas is based on information from the 2007 census. *Bench Maji *Arba-Minch *Dawro *Gamo Gofa *Gedeo *Gurage *Hadiya *Keffa *Keficho Shekicho *Kembata Tembaro *North Omo *Sheka *Sidama *Silti *South Omo *Wolayita *Alaba (special woreda) *Amaro (special woreda) *Basketo (special woreda, formerly part of North Omo Zone) *Burji (special woreda) *Dirashe (special woreda) *Konso (special woreda) *Konta (special woreda, formerly part of North Omo Zone) *Yem (special woreda) ==References== Category:1990s establishments in Africa Category:1994 establishments Category:Regions of Ethiopia
title: Southern Nations, Nationalities, and People's Region
